sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>90</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/90</github_url> <message>var password = SNC.PasswordPolicyEvaluator.generateUserPassword('itil'); //username as input var result = SNC.PasswordPolicyEvaluator.setUserPassword('itil', password);  The script Include in which this is referred - PasswordPolicyUtil  Credit: Muralidharan B S (LinkedIn)</message> <number>TIL0001092</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-03-07 17:30:36</sys_created_on> <sys_id>04636a9a2fc6451051dad5f62799b6ae</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-03-09 17:40:15</sys_updated_on> <title>Generate and set some strong user passwords.</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
